website_summaries.verdict: Great design to catch both shots you make and miss. Fits well with most home basketball hoop systems.
pros: Best basketball rebound system on the market with a design that forces you to shoot with a proper arc to improve your shot
It's easy to install and it's stored compactly
The built-in ramp can adjust 180 degrees to where you'd like the ball to return
cons: The balls bounce out sometimes and they sometimes get stuck between the net and the rim

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY for all aspiring basketball players!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing!!! It was not hard to put together at all!!! Highly recommend this product!!! It has already helped my son get that proper arc in his shot :) Shipping directly from Airborne Athletics was super fast and I just chose the regular shipping method!!! I want to say about 3-4 business days it was on my front door step :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good product
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty cool. It spits the balls back at a very nice pace so that if you are working with two balls you have just enough time to set up and shoot again before the next one gets to you. My son has a bad attitude in the video because his dad was trying to give some constructive criticism a minute earlier and that did not go well. If my son shoots with this thing regularly there’s very good odds he will improve his accuracy, and that’s the whole point so, all in all, I am very happy with this product. A little difficult to put together but not rocket science either. The kid really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 30 minute assembly durable material
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Durable and sturdy. Took about 30 minutes to assemble with one other person. Up to 3 shooters at one time works fine. Worth the money and kids are able to lift the frame up onto the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The IC3 is a great addition to any outdoor basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: I am not longer my son's personal ball retriever anymore. The IC3 is a great addition to any outdoor basketball hoop. Its very well made and feels like it will last a very long time. Installation was pretty easy except the netting could be easier. My son loves it so much he was outside in 90 degree heat shooting. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley G

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T FIT AND COMPANY DOESN'T CARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: AVOID THIS PRODUCT AT ALL COST. THEY DON'T RESPOND TO MESSAGES FOR HELP AND DON'T OFFER REFUNDS EVEN THOUGH THE PRODUCT DOESN'T FIT A STANDARD BASKETBALL HOOP AND CAUSES THE BALL TO GET STUCK. I BASICALLY PAID FOR A PRODUCT THAT CAUSES THE BALL TO GET JAMMED EVERY TIME!
customer_reviews.author: CHO

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get much better!
customer_reviews.text: Really do not know where to start, but this is awesome. Took me no time to put it together and my daughter was so excited that she used it for hours the first time. There are tons of videos on YouTube regarding different drills to use. Between this and DribbleUP I am seeing more improvement in my daughter's game than going to a trainer. Great tool, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic tool. We use it for developing arc on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tool. We use it for developing arc on the kids shot and it works! We have a small space for our hoop so this is great for that as we don't have to worry about chasing rebounds everywhere. I give 4 stars because sometimes the balls bounce out, but that's to be expected. But the biggest issue is when balls get stuck between the net and the rim sometimes. You'll be in a shooting rhythm and you have to dislodge the ball. Otherwise we are very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely great for any basketball player at any level.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. Works great! Kids (and I) love it. Definitely would recommend for anyone wanting to improve their shot. It's great to use with two or three balls to improve a quicker shot. The only thing is that some of the poles take a bit of muscle to extend. Also, would be nice if there were a built in strap to keep the poles together when the unit is taken down for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ian O

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome in the yard
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Looks awesome in the yard. I think it's helped my son improve his shot a bit. Only issue is that requires periodic tweaks because one of the rails occasionally slides a loose. Overall, very satisfied, although I think it's a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Functional piece of equiment.
customer_reviews.text: Nice functional piece of equipment for budget training. Will recommend it for any individual or small school program for training players. If your kids are serious about basketball, invest in this you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hanover Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! In a span of 1 minutes
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! In a span of 1 minutes, you can get about 10 or so reps. You can knock out 300 reps within half an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Romy E.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product for your basketball enthusiast! It took my 2 teenage sons about 2.5 hours to put together and they couldn’t wait to try it out. My one son shot 250 shots within 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Gonsioroski

customer_reviews.title: much larger and bulkier than expect. my daughter is ...
customer_reviews.text: much larger and bulkier than expect. my daughter is quite young so I needed to make some alterations to basic setup to use. need 2 people to put on and take off
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Poor Man's Basketball Gun
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shooting aid. You will need extra Velcro or wire ties for the net. It helps to not have the balls stick on the rim. It takes about 2 hours to get it together and set etc. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shona

customer_reviews.title: My son uses this often. It has more than ...
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this often. It has more than doubled the number of shots he can get it in per workout.
customer_reviews.author: David Rose

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good investment. Husband uses it to train son in our backyard. Our backyard is sloped down away from house...the netting helps guide the ball towards you so you don't have to spend your entire time chasing after the ball. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: we were pleasantly surprised how easy to assemble and how well the product worked
customer_reviews.text: we were pleasantly surprised how easy to assemble and how well the product worked. For the price, we thought it was a good purchase and very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids LOVE it and now I don't need to rebound
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to put it and store
customer_reviews.text: Takes time to get assembled, durable, fits well on goose-neck goals. easy to put it and store. well worth it. sometimes balls fly out because of the double rim. Helps create a rhythm and can get 100-200 shots easy with two balls.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Useful training aid
customer_reviews.text: Good design -- folds up compactly for storage. Met expectations on all counts.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cholmsky

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. You can shoot 2-3 times more shots.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Developes the proper arc when shooting. Good training tool.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is challenging and taking it up and down from the rim is cumbersome. However, once it's in place, it works very well and provides excellent shot training. Ball comes right back to you after each shot.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Fay

customer_reviews.title: easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: works well and its very portable, easy on and off. The counter is not always accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsie Gena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: still snowing here in Indiana but it was fairly easy to put together and its ready go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great practice aid
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fun for the drive way - forgetting practicing layups but if you want a good work out get a couple of balls going. I think it improves lazy arc resulting in flat shots. Especially good if you practice by your self or if you are the Dad passing to your kid to practice jump shots. A little heavy for kids to move and sometimes the ball gets stuck but overall good value.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: More Shots = Better Player
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took about 30-45 mins with my 13 yr old son helping me. Once done seems to be a well built product and allows my kids to shoot and get a ball return to any spot on the court allowing them to work on different angle shots. Our driveway is on a hill so before this the ball could bounce off the rim and roll down the hill. The net on this eliminates almost all of that problem and forces anyone to have a correct arch on their shot because of having to shoot over the out stretched arms.
customer_reviews.author: AvidBooker

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: It took a few hours to assemble. It is much sturdier than I thought it would be. I have a Lifetime 4 foot backboard with an inground pole and it fits fine. The unit moves a little as expected but it is tight. Some hard rebounds may jump the netting. My son was skeptical at first but likes it alot. He can get a few hundred shots up using 2 balls easy in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Cakes

customer_reviews.title: The additional repetition and the required angle have him shooting better already in open
customer_reviews.text: Shot Trainer is working well for my son. The additional repetition and the required angle have him shooting better already in open gym
customer_reviews.author: Todd T. Yates

customer_reviews.title: IC3
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased the system for my daughter who's a shooting guard. Assembly went well. The most challenging part was figuring how to install the net. Overall we are pleased with the system. It allows her to increase shot volume while decreasing training time.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Scott

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well... shot is improving!! But it is difficult for a kid to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: great find
customer_reviews.text: It was everything you said it would be, very pleased. It does the job and more, we will no doubt be a better shooting team.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lopez

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME....
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money. My 10 year old son got up about 250 shots in less than 10 minutes. Most young kids miss a lot and this is great for getting in a lot of reps. You can really work on form and muscle memory development with this aid
customer_reviews.author: Somertime

customer_reviews.title: Ic3 shooting wonder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the IC3 Shooting machine and it is the perfect backyard assistant. It is compact, durable and well designed. It forces the shooter to improve/adjust the angle for the correct trajectory. Also, the return or rebounding design is SICK. It works great and you can adjust from sideline to sideline. Lastly, customer service is very professional and helpful and I would definitely purchase more products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Un C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic residential rebounder. I played NCAA basketball, back then I used a commercial version which was great but boat loads more expensive. The assembly is time consuming but farely easy with help from YouTube. I would recommend this hoop to anyone looking to improve their jump shot which included adults and kids. I have a hoop which was donated to me, and after the first day using iC3 I worn out the net (see the picture below). I also worn out the rim too, no picture provided. It's not perfect but the best I've ever used for a home system.
customer_reviews.author: HBailey

customer_reviews.title: Built very well and seems like it will last
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. Built very well and seems like it will last. On a double rim, a lot of balls will bounce out of the netting if you miss. Still it works pretty well and with 2 balls you can get up a lot of shots quickly. The downside to this product is that its pretty cumbersome and a 12 year old kid could not lift it up onto a rim at the park on his or her own. Its also pretty big and wont fit in a small call. Need an suv or plenty of back space to fit it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASING DESICION I'VE MADE!
customer_reviews.text: If you love basketball and play daily you have to get one of these. It's definitely improved my shot because it allows you to focus on your mechanics and not chasing rebounds the whole time. Can't tell you enough how much I recommend this for anyone looking to improve their shot.
customer_reviews.author: EVOLV FITNESS

customer_reviews.title: Hard work pays off
customer_reviews.text: I used this and now I’m headed for the NBA ❌🧢 look me up @Dylan Windler
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: It works fantastic! No more chasing loose balls and you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and installed it about 2 days ago. It works fantastic! No more chasing loose balls and you can shoot from anywhere. This will return the ball to you. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants to practice shooting a lot and efficiently!
customer_reviews.author: D. Che

customer_reviews.title: Good driveway rebounder
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was time consuming, and it was especially tricky getting the net on correctly. Requires 2 people. With 2 people, mounts quickly and easily onto the hoop. Was a slight glitch when we tried it out with ball getting stuck in the apparatus. We fixed it by adding another piece of Velcro in center. Ball return works well and can be easily moved to change directions. Overall good value for the price. Wheels easily for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Fogarty

product_meta.title: iC3 Basketball Shot Trainer
product_meta.description:
Change the way you train, developing muscle memory and better shot trajectory with the Dr. Dish iC3 Basketball Shot Trainer. 

The iC3 Shot Trainer increases shooting reps by 300% with up to 16 shots per minute with correct form and arc to maximize performance. It's no secret. If you want to compete at the highest level, you need to train on a iC3 basketball shot trainer because it helps you develop game time muscle memory in the shortest amount of time. 

You will become a basketball shooting machine when you use the iC3 basketball shot trainer from Dr. Dish Basketball!

 Increase Shot Reps, Improve Your Basketball Game 


--Train and improve your basketball game without having to constantly chase after the basketball.

--Black net captures both made and missed shots; developing the form to shoot at a 45-degree arc

--Built-in ramp adjusts 180-degrees to adjust where the ball will be returned

 Easy Set-Up and Take Down

--iC3 basketball shot trainer rests on the rim of your existing basketball hoop, taking only seconds to set up.

--Designed for pole-supported hoops; compatible with standard 72" backboards

 --Sturdy welded steel frame holds up against hot/cold temperatures and rain

--Indoor storage during extreme weather is recommended

--Requires two 10 mm wrenches for assembly (not included)

 Additional Details:

 Recommended for ages 7 and up

 Model: iC3 Basketball Shot Trainer

 Brand: Dr. Dish Basketball

Train Smarter, Score More with the iC3 Basketball Shot Trainer!
feature_bullets: Extend the gym to your driveway | Our basketball shot trainer fits easily on most home basketball hoop systems.
Our patented basketball shot trainer is designed to catch & return made & missed shots | No more time spent chasing your basketball down the driveway.
Stop shooting bricks | The iC3's patented design forces a proper arc to improve your basketball shot
The iC3 basketball shot trainer installs easily & stores compactly | Spend more time shooting baskets & improving your ball game
Get thousands of extra basketball shots with the iC3 basketball shot trainer by Dr. Dish Basketball
